short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Notes Petite to write, to download and to print.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"My notes Petite"  is a personal or professional notes to write. The notes header displays the date and an area to write, - anything random, important, fun or otherwise.  You can change the color of your browser. The content to write is rich text enabled to include font, change size and also to include images. You can include as many images you want but they will be displayed as a small image.The print and download  buttons enables you to download or/and print your important, or not so important note. The content can be downloaded as pdf, and has a text date for your reference along with your note. The clear button is to clear the note inside the text area.

Note: The download button downloads as a pdf document, but many rich text features may be missing. It is better to use print and then 'save as pdf' feature.
